item.title: Applicable values for AddItemRequest.Item.Country
item.description:
Applicable values for AddItemRequest.Item.Country

•   AA(in/out) NOTE: APO/FPO was defined in eBay list previously but they are not defined in ISO 3166. This country will remain on eBay country code list for backward compatibility.•   AD
